com.nestlabs.sdk

Class NestAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nestlabs.sdk.NestAPI

  • public final class NestAPI
extends Object
    NestAPI creates an easy-to-use interface for both reading to and writing from the Nest API.

    To get started, set the Context with setAndroidContext(Context) After a context is set, get the singleton instance NestAPI object with getInstance()

    You can call getInstance() anytime after initialization anywhere in your app to access this object again.

    • Method Detail

      • setAndroidContext

        public static void setAndroidContext(Context context)
        Sets the Context. You must call this with a valid Context object. If this method is not called before trying to use the NestAPI instance, all interactions with the API will likely fail. You only need to call this once.
        Parameters:
        context - A valid Context.

      • getInstance

        public static NestAPI getInstance()
        Returns the instance of the NestAPI, if one exists, otherwise creates a new one.
        Returns:
        A NestAPI instance for interacting with the Nest API.

      • setConfig

        public void setConfig(String clientId,
                      String clientSecret,
                      String redirectUrl)
        Sets the Nest configuration values used for authentication.
        Parameters:
        clientId - The Nest client ID.
        clientSecret - The Nest client secret.
        redirectUrl - The Nest redirect URL.

      • getConfig

        public NestConfig getConfig()
        Returns a NestConfig object containing the currently set credentials. If there are no credentials set, returns null.
        Returns:
        a NestConfig object containing current config values, or null if unset.

      • clearConfig

        public void clearConfig()
        Clears the currently stored credentials.

      • authWithToken

        public void authWithToken(NestToken token,
                          NestListener.AuthListener listener)
        Requests authentication with a NestToken.
        Parameters:
        token - the NestToken to authenticate with
        listener - a listener to be notified when authentication succeeds or fails

      • authWithToken

        public void authWithToken(String token,
                          NestListener.AuthListener authListener)
        Requests authentication with a raw token.
        Parameters:
        token - the token String to authenticate with
        authListener - a listener notified when authentication succeeds, fails, or is revoked.

      • getAccessTokenFromIntent

        public static NestToken getAccessTokenFromIntent(Intent intent)
        Returns a NestToken embedded in the Intent that is returned in the result from launchAuthFlow(Activity, int).
        Parameters:
        intent - the intent to retrieve the NestToken from.
        Returns:
        the NestToken, if it was contained in the Intent, otherwise null.

      • revokeToken

        public void revokeToken(NestToken token,
                        Callback callback)
        Revokes a NestToken from the Nest API.
        Parameters:
        token - The token to revoke.
        callback - A callback for the result of the revocation.

      • addGlobalListener

        public void addGlobalListener(NestListener.GlobalListener listener)
        Adds a listener to receive updates when any data changes.
        Parameters:
        listener - the NestListener.GlobalListener to receive changes.

      • addDeviceListener

        public void addDeviceListener(NestListener.DeviceListener listener)
        Adds a listener to receive updates when any Device changes.
        Parameters:
        listener - the NestListener.DeviceListener to receive changes.

        Parameters:
        listener - the NestListener.ThermostatListener to receive dchanges.

        Adds a listener to receive updates when any Camera changes.
        Parameters:

        Parameters:

      • addMetadataListener

        public void addMetadataListener(NestListener.MetadataListener listener)
        Adds a listener to receive updates when the Metadata changes.
        Parameters:
        listener - the NestListener.MetadataListener to receive changes.

      • removeListener

        public boolean removeListener(NestListener listener)
        Removes a listener, turning off any notification of changes. Must pass in the same listener object that was initially added.
        Parameters:
        listener - the NestListener to remove and turn off notifications for.
        Returns:
        true if the listener was successfully removed, false if the listener didn't exist.

      • removeAllListeners

        public void removeAllListeners()
        Removes all listeners, turning off all updates to changes from the Nest API.

      • launchAuthFlow

        public void launchAuthFlow(Activity activity,
                           int requestCode)
        Start an Activity which will guide a user through the authentication process.
        Parameters:
        activity - the Activity return the result. Typically the current Activity.
        requestCode - the request code for which a result will be returned.
